clearSelection

public void clearSelection(java.lang.String sessionId,
                           java.lang.String dimensionName,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> memberNames)
                    throws RpcException
Description copied from interface: Query
Removes the selection status of members inside a given dimension. You must first make sure to call Sesison.setCurrentQuery() to inform the backend of your current query selection.

Specified by:
clearSelection in interface Query
Parameters:
sessionId - Identifies the window session id that requested the operation.
dimensionName - Name of the dimension that includes the members to remove selection status.
memberNames - The actual member names of which we want to remove the selection status.
Throws:
RpcException - If something goes sour.

createSelection

public void createSelection(java.lang.String sessionId,
                            java.lang.String dimensionName,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> memberNames,
                            java.lang.String selectionType)
                     throws RpcException
Description copied from interface: Query
Performs a selection of certain members in a dimension. You must first make sure to call Sesison.setCurrentQuery() to inform the backend of your current query selection.

Specified by:
createSelection in interface Query
Parameters:
sessionId - Identifies the window session id that requested the operation.
dimensionName - The name of the dimension on which we want to select members.
memberNames - The actual names of the members to perform a selection on.
selectionType - The type of selection to perform.
Throws:
RpcException - If something goes sour.

moveDimension

public void moveDimension(java.lang.String sessionId,
                          Axis axis,
                          java.lang.String dimensionName)
                   throws RpcException
Description copied from interface: Query
Moves a dimension to a different axis. You must first make sure to call Sesison.setCurrentQuery() to inform the backend of your current query selection.

Specified by:
moveDimension in interface Query
Parameters:
sessionId - Identifies the window session id that requested the operation.
axis - The destination axis.
dimensionName - The name of the dimension to move.
Throws:
RpcException - If something goes sour.

executeQuery

public OlapData executeQuery(java.lang.String sessionId)
                      throws RpcException
Description copied from interface: Query
Executes the current query. You must first make sure to call Sesison.setCurrentQuery() to inform the backend of your current query selection.

Specified by:
executeQuery in interface Query
Parameters:
sessionId - Identifies the window session id that requested the operation.
Returns:
The result of the query execution.
Throws:
RpcException - If something goes sour.
